name: Doppler
0:
”Alexa, open Doppler”
”Alexa, ask Doppler to lower its brightness”
”Alexa, ask Doppler to change display color”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doppler
des:
The Doppler skill allows you to control the basic functions of your Sandman Doppler with your voice. You can set the brightness and color of both the buttons and screen on the Doppler using your voice. More features to come soon!"

We only have official support in the US, but to make it easier for your to develop, im happy to launch anywhere that is helpful for you.
